EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_ProfessionalServices_Cold_Nurture.ProfessionalServices_Nurture_Ent
EmailTemplate.subject: What Does Your Path to Cloud Look Like?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-path-to-hybrid-cloud]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As your organization strives for increased agility and elasticity, cloud adoption is imminent. However, a fundamental question remains: What, when, and where should you run workloads to assure performance at the lowest possible cost?
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-path-to-hybrid-cloud]]>
This challenge is beyond human scale. Through AI-powered automation, Turbonomic makes the performance-cost driving placement, sizing and auto-scaling decisions across clouds.
Check out this white paper <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-path-to-hybrid-cloud]]> to learn more about navigating the challenges of cloud adoption at scale and how we can help you with intelligent migration to AWS and Azure.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
